planet.name: Kepler-62 b
KIC-9002278 b
KOI-701 b
planet.description: The Kepler-62 system has five planets. Two of them orbit in the habitable zone. Only the size, not the mass of planets in this system is known. Kepler-62 could be the Holy Grail of exoplanetology: a system with a rocky or water planet in the habitable zone.

planet.name: Kepler-62 e
KIC-9002278 e
KOI-701 e
planet.description: The Kepler-62 system has five planets. Two of them orbit in the habitable zone. Kepler-62 e is one of them. Only the size, not the mass of planets in this system is known. Kepler-62 could be the Holy Grail of exoplanetology: a system with a rocky or water planet in the habitable zone.

Artist's impression of Kepler-62 e.
Credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech/T. Pyle
